name: more-recipes
description: A platform for users to share the awesome and exciting recipes ideas they have learnt or invented

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha server/test/test.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: set NODE_ENV=test-l&&sequelize db:migrate:undo:all&&sequelize db:migrate&& istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha server/test/test.js
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: William Olojede
